body:
It seems like the root issue here is the Go project is not using GitHub's "Releases" feature.  If you switch to ListTags like the Stack Overflow responder suggests, it appears to correctly list the Go releases.

I'm going to close, because I think this is working as intended at the moment.  If you think the Go project should alter its release workflow to make use of GitHub Releases, I suggest going through the [Go proposal process](https://golang.org/s/proposal-process).
